replies.body: this coming from the company that reworked leblanc into what she is now talking about riven being button mashing

They were talking about spamming buttons for mobility. 

If you spam your W on Leblanc....you just end up teleporting back to where you started.
Isn't it possible to sort of spam Yasuo's E for mobility? Though I believe it takes more time to learn than Riven's kit in general...
lol yasuo isnt hard to learn at all. you press e on a minion wave over and over until you run out of minions to dash to.
that feeling when you cant dash to the enemy cuase you had too much fun dashing through minions.
Feel free to call Leblanc op or whatever, but you can't just faceroll on her.  You generally do need to get that passive off.

{{champion:157}} I saw people saying this guy was faceroll...

When people hate a champion enough, a lot of them just claim "noskill"
He is faceroll.

no, he's not faceroll.
faceroll means you can literally mash your buttons and you'll do okay.
if you spam your e on yasuo, you're just gonna end up under the enemy tower.
He's faceroll when you're down in Bronze 5, if my intuition serves me correctly.
Anything is faceroll in bronze 5 lmao, bronze 5 is just a button-mashing contest. Whoever plays their champion least incorrectly wins.
can confirm, inconsistancy is our main problem.
felt like downvoting you cuase we play a diffrent meta.
Riven is faceroll, I even got a penta this way{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
that mini cc.......

Yasuo is only hard to kill when you have no stuns or roots to place on him. Slows work less since his E maintains his mobility. Exhaust helps a lot, but mainly you just need to stop him from moving and he will commit explosive seppuku over the shame of being a boosted animal. Or just charm him and do one damage rotation with {{champion:103}} ...That's usually enough to make Trashuo players question their life choices.{{summoner:31}}

as a bronzie i find yas fun to play against, fuck up hell wreck you play right he wont carry his team.

i can also barely use his kit i fk up q and dont use w e effectively and miss R useage, hes balanced too much for low elo.

but that last remark was just my opinion im sure bronzie yas mains will fk my world up.

Yeah they're mostly Ahri(Hate this bitch) mains..
the passive / movespeed on q changes made me quit playing her much.
Funniest shit I have seen in a while.
On a side note probably just an attempt to cover all their shitty decisions recently in balancing.

> If you're really attached to spamming buttons to try & look cool, just play Riven.

See, Yasuo mains? I've been trying to tell you, but NOOOOO, just keep fucking dashing around for fucking nothing til you get yourself killed by an enemy turret for some goddamn reason.
Maybe in silver 5 lol, but in your elo all champions are that way, it's who plays their champion the least incorrectly. So when you keep trying to tell us you're only right in wooden elo xD.
Gold 3 to be exact, and I was Plat 5 last season. You're basically elo-shaming by using a ditched account.

Damn

Well they arent wrong

{{champion:92}} mains about to {{summoner:14}} via spontaneous combustion, and they will face the {{champion:21}} of being {{item:1083}}ed from the player base by permanent bans due to {{champion:29}} reactions leading to their accounts ending up in self-dug {{champion:104}}.

As you will find out from RossBoomSocks, with the exception of some trolls and memes intentionally acting that way, most Riven mains just roll with the punches and laugh along. I love toxic Riven Main jokes.
i aint got nothing against the playerbase if theyre cool, i just dont like being mini cc'd THAT much XD which isent all that bad early.
Meh, Riot isn't wrong, putting mobility on a champ with no mana and have it all he ground targeted will lead to it being spammed to move places
